CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to SQL Injection attacks. The 'indexName' and 'i.columns' variables are directly concatenated into the SQL query without any form of sanitization or parameterization. An attacker could potentially manipulate 'indexName' or 'i.columns' to execute arbitrary SQL commands.
